question: Nowadays, people prefer to live and work anywhere they want because of the improvement in transportation and technology. Discuss the benefits and the drawbacks of this?
text: In today’s present times, the advancement of technology and transportation have resulted in more possibilities when it comes to choosing where to live and work. In this essay, I will discuss the pros and cons of this context.

One of the benefits that this development has presented is that  more job opportunities are available. It has become more convenient to find work because of the internet. For instance,  telemarketing jobs are becoming more popular due to the “WORK FROM HOME” option they offer. With this kind of work setting, it has become more suitable for anybody who has a computer to apply for this job. Another advantage is that  having  quality time with family is more evident than it ever was because of the modernization of technology. People can choose the time and place where they can work. For example, working online and having a vacation can be easily done nowadays. Just by bringing your work gadgets you can have a vacation on an island while doing your work in this type of environment.

For the transport sector, the upgraded subways and buses are evidently seen to be the reason for cutting travel time by 80%. This has positively impacted their lives because of how much extra time they have to be able to accomplish other things rather than sitting in  traffic every day.

Of course, there are minor drawbacks that accompany the advancement of technology and transportation. It had produced a more sedentary lifestyle. People nowadays are becoming more reliant on smartphones and other gadgets which resulted in diseases. One of these is becoming obese. Because of working conveniently at home, you have the tendency to sit most of the time, hence, no time for exercise.
In conclusion, while there might be minor drawbacks, it is still the positive outcomes that technologies and transportations offer which makes living and working anywhere become an option.

error_list.error_des: It appears that you are missing a comma after the introductory phrase Just by bringing your work gadgets. Consider adding a comma.
